summary: Patch to add Mapquest Aerial tiles to TileSourceFactory.java

comments.content:
I noticed you included a number of tile sources for use in the project, including Mapquest's. Mapquest's OSM maps and Aerial maps are great. I mad a little patch to add the Aerial tiles as a source as well.

Love the project! Thanks!

Mapquest aerial only supports zoom levels 0-11
http://developer.mapquest.com/web/products/open/map
This issue was closed by revision r988.
